answerText: epinephrine [or adrenaline][10] Epinephrine, like all catecholamines, is synthesized from this amino acid, which has a phenol group in its side chain. L-DOPA is synthesized from it, too.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | Harvard-Florida A-Louisville A | 20 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this catecholamine hormone which activates the fight-or-flight response of the sympathetic nervous system.
